div.style: font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; font-size: 17px; color: #1C2826; line-height: 1.7; letter-spacing: 0.01em;
div.p: Spent an incredible week in this paradise and it was absolutely breathtaking! The crystal clear turquoise waters, pristine white sandy beaches, and friendly locals made this trip unforgettable.
The seafood was amazing and trying local cuisine at the night market was a highlight of my trip...

p.style: margin: 0; font-family: 'Montserrat'; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #1C2826;

div.p: Beautiful view! How was the weather during your stay? I'm planning to visit next month.
